comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: If someone knows where this fountain is, it'd make a really great "Then and Now."

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Doris and Simon Konover recently endowed a chair in Judaic Studies at the University of Connecticut: uconnmagazine.uconn.edu/sprg2008/around.html#a20 advance.uconn.edu/2007/071022/07102201.htm Doris was a UConn alumna (1950, nursing), and the couple initially helped establish the Center for Judaic Studies and Contemporary Jewish Life. There is also a Doris and Simon Konover Arts Wing at the Mandell Jewish Community Center in Hartford. www.jewishhartford.org/page.aspx?id=181380
